programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: Skate Expectations: After being impressed by Chuck's skateboarding skills, Lydia tries her hand at skating to catch the school's attention - which has nothing to do with Chuck, of course. (S1, ep 17)

programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: Prides-Maids: When Julie invites her dad, James (aka Mapleview's favourite drag queen, Aurora Borealis) to perform at Pride week, the girls think they have popularity in the bag. (S1, ep 18)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Thundersense: Phoebe gets the ability to sense danger before it happens, and uses it to impress her classmates. Meanwhile, Max pretends that he has not got his new power yet. (S1, ep 14)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Have an Ice Birthday: Phoebe and Max want to be trusted to have a normal teenage birthday party, but when Mrs. Wong goes missing, they realize how good their family parties are. (S1, ep 15)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: A Tale of Two Pipers: Henry gets an unexpected visitor claiming to be from the future. When a boy-robot arrives, The Gang must find a way to save everyone from an apocalyptic future. (S5, ep 23)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Captain Mom: Captain Man is being a baby about having a baby. Labour pains leave him helpless so Kid Danger and Piper step up to take on a couple of slick grease thieves. (S5, ep 26)

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: Siblings: Anika and Oliver argue after he shares an upsetting theory with her. Meanwhile, Sal and Jasmyn must attempt a daring and dangerous mission to find the next riddle stone. (S3, ep 16)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: When Smurfette rescues Brainy from a snake, the others ask her to teach them "Smurf-Fu', then in 'Diaper Daddy', everyone is tired of changing Baby's diapers, Handy invents a robot to help.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Who's Heftier?: Wimpy challenges Hefty to a test of strength and wins by accident! (S1, ep 4b)

programme.title: Best & Bester
programme.desc: Best is mistaken for a notorious jewel thief in 'Mugshot', then in 'Taken to the Cleaners', Best and Bester go on an undercover mission to find out why items of laundry are going missing. (S1, ep 15)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Squidward's amazing new life is threatened in 'Squidness Protection', and in 'Dome Alone', stuck in her dome, Sandy suspects Plankton's up to no good and recruits Patrick to investigate. (S15, ep 6)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob must go to extremes when Gary refuses to go to the vet in 'Wary Gary', then in 'Pinned', SpongeBob gets stuck while working out. (S15, ep 7)

programme.title: Zokie of Planet Ruby
programme.desc: Ruby tries to prove that Zokie is responsible in 'Responsible Sleepover', then in 'The Bolt Strikes Back', Ruby and Zokie inspire a washed up wrestler to become King of the Ring again. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel wishes a manga character to life in 'Prime Meridian Love', then in 'Stanky Danky', Hazel wishes up a trash monster. (S1, ep 7)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Simsky: Simon is alarmed to discover he's been tagging private property in his sleep and its inspired a group of copycats.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: The Great Chipmunk Detective: When Miss Miller gets robbed, Eleanor and Theodore promise to find the culprit and bring them to justice.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: The Crush: Simon has a crush on the babysitter and secretly prepares a romantic dinner while Theodore keeps Alvin distracted. (S4, ep 13b)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: U-Fly: Alvin's too short to ride an exhilarating new amusement park ride, so he devises a plan to sneak on after hours. (S5, ep 3a)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Pearl gets a job to be cool like her friends in 'Mall Girl Pearl', and then in 'Two Thumbs Down', SpongeBob loses the use of his thumbs and must get them working before his entire life falls apart.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: The Sharks are the toughest guys in town, but their next confrontation might be too much in 'Sharks vs. Pods', and then in 'CopyBob DittoPants', Plankton clones SpongeBob to steal the secret formula.

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: Unwelcome to the Jungle: Sonic finds himself in a strange jungle world with even stranger tree-dwelling versions of his friends, whom he must protect from a "monster" below. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: Barking Up the Wrong Tree: Sonic is shocked that the Boscage Maze "Monster" is Amy AKA Thorn Rose. Wielding a Paradox Prism shard, Thorn wages war on the tree-dwelling Scavengers. (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Bummer School: Chloe, Jinx, and Booch are designing a new school mascot, but Max and Phoebe's fighting ruins the project. They realize their twin-fighting impacts Chloe in new ways now. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: The Parent Zap: After Phoebe and Max let Chloe's friends watch a horror movie and eat sweets, Jinx and Booch's parents want to meet Chloe's. So Max and Phoebe transform into Hank and Barb. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Stuck In Two Holes: Captain Man and Kid Danger are each stuck in a hole? Charlotte and Jasper had better go help, because Schwoz is taking a bean bath! (S3, ep 17)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Balloons of Doom: When Dr. Minyak takes the Man Fans hostage, Captain Man and Kid Danger have to find a way to rescue them without Dr. Minyak seeing them move. (S3, ep 18)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Mr. Krabs finds pets are profitable in 'A Place for Pets', then in 'Lockdown for Love', Plankton ruins another date with Karen, so she puts the Chum Bucket on lockdown until he proves his affection.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Squidward's house becomes infested with a mail-order flea circus in 'Under the Small Top', then in 'Squidward's Sick Daze', Squidward fakes being sick, but SpongeBob arrives to care for him.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Time Flies: Alvin and Brittany are convinced Simon has vanished back in time and go all out in an attempt to bring him back.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Talking Teddy's Revenge: When Alvin thinks Theodore's teddy bear can tell the future, Alvin goes all out to make Talking Teddy his friend.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Sing Like A Canary: A cute singing bird replaces Alvin in the band after Alvin makes too many demands as a performer. (S4, ep 5b)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: The Chosen Chipmunk: Alvin sneaks into Simon's new virtual reality game and is transported to a world in desperate need of a hero. (S4, ep 20a)

programme.title: Kamp Koral
programme.desc: Narlene and Nobby teach Regigilled about backwoods living in 'Regi-Hilled', then in 'The Perfect Camper', the Trawler cabin creates the perfect camper to compete in the Camp Summer Games. (S1, ep 23)

programme.title: Kamp Koral
programme.desc: Craig Mammalton learns what it's like to not be the best at something in 'Eye of the Hotdog', then in 'Patrick Takes the Cake', Patrick and a cake hide out in the wilderness. (S1, ep 24)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Save Royal Woods!: When Royal Woods is in danger of being flooded to make room for a sixth Great Lake, the town comes together to prove that they're worth saving. (S6, ep 4)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln seeks a better seat in class in 'Musical Chairs', then in 'The Taunting Hour', Lynn gets heckled at her soccer game, and the Louds realize they all have critics. (S6, ep 5)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Sandy wants a relaxing vacation alone on the moon, but she's got a stowaway aboard her rocket in 'Mooncation', and then in 'Mr. Krabs Takes A Vacation', Mr Krabs takes a trip to the Ocean Mint.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Mermaidman and Barnacleboy let SpongeBob and Patrick in on their secret heroic origins in 'Mermaidman Begins', and in 'Plankton's Good Eye', Plankton uses SpongeBob's DNA to grow himself a second eye.

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: The Yoke's on You: Before the Prism Battle, Shadow and Sonic go head-to-head in an epic fight. In New Yoke City, the Chaos Council discover Sonic's connection to their power source. (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: Escape from New Yoke: The rebels battle the Chaos Council to secure the "Crystal" that gives supreme power. Sonic assumes this crystal is the Paradox Prism, but he's stunned by the truth. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Test Friends: Without them knowing, Captain Man puts Danger Force through a series of tests to see if he can trust them. Things get out of hand, and the tables turn on who can be trusted. (S1, ep 15)

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: The Parent Zap: After Phoebe and Max let Chloe's friends watch a horror movie and eat sweets, Jinx and Booch's parents want to meet Chloe's. So Max and Phoebe transform into Hank and Barb. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Save The Date: Max bets Phoebe she can't turn off being a superhero and go on a normal date. Chloe helps Phoebe do well on the date, but Max tries to sabotage it by crying wolf. (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Flabber Gassed: After acting too confident before a fight, Kid Danger & Captain Man are sprayed with Flabber Gas making them powerless to defeat a new villain in Swellview. (S5, ep 1)

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Mae Guto a'i ffrindiau yn cael tipyn o syndod o ddeall bod lleidr radish yn eu dilyn! Guto and his friends have a radish robber on their tails!

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Heddiw mae Ben Dant yn ymuno disgyblion Ysgol Y Graig, Merthyr Tudful i greu trysor penigamp. Ben Dant is on a new adventure to recycle and turn rubbish and waste into a masterpiece.

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Mae Arloeswyr Pontypandy yn trio ennill bathodynnau adeiladu raft. Ond mae charjyr diffygiol Jams yn achosi tan. The Pontypandy pioneers are trying to win badges for building a raft.

programme.title: Kim a Cai a Cranc
programme.desc: Ymunwch Kim a Cai ar antur hudolus a chwareus sy'n llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am gragen newydd i Cranc! Join Kim and Cai as they search for a new shell for Cranc!

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae Pablo eisiau gwybod beth sy'n digwydd ym mhennod nesaf ei hoff sioe deledu, ac mae ef a'r anifeiliaid yn mynd ar daith am yr ateb. Pablo wants to know more about his fave TV programme.

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Mae Coedwig hardd yr Olobobs yn llawn sbwriel! A all Tib, Lalw a Bobl ddarganfod pwy yw'r troseddwr a datrys pethe? The Olobobs discover giant-sized litter all over their beautiful forest!

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: 'Dyw Pigog ddim yn gwbod pa ffordd i droi wrth iddi hi geisio helpu ei ffrindiau i gyd ar yr un pryd. Pigog finds herself torn in several directions while helping friends.

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Mae Cadi, y gyrrwr trn, mewn trafferth pan fydd dwy ddraig ifanc yn mynd 'i hinjan stm am daith heb ofyn. Trouble for Cadi when young dragons take her steam engine for an unplanned trip.

programme.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Pam mae boliau Blero a Talfryn yn gwneud synau digri'?Mae'r ateb bob tro draw yn Ocido! Why do Blero and Talfryn's tummies make funny rumbling noises? Off they go to Ocido to find out!

programme.title: Deian a Loli
programme.desc: Ma'r efeillaid yn edrych ymlaen i fwyta crempog, ond ma 'na greadur bach arall sydd yn awyddus i fwyta eu brecwast, pry cop o'r enw Prys! A spider called Prys is after the twins' pancakes!

programme.title: New: Stwnsh Sadwrn Byw
programme.desc: Jack, Leah, Lloyd, Jed a Cadi sy' yn y stiwdio, gyda llond lle o gemau, LOL-ian ac ambell pei Stwnsh! Jack, Leah, Lloyd, Jed and Cadi are in the studio with games and the odd Stwnsh pie!

programme.title: Annibendod
programme.desc: Mae Gari'n poeni bod llygoden yn yr ysgol ond yn methu ei ddal, ac mae Miss Enfys wedi drysu ei diwrnodau. Gary's worried there's a mouse in the school but he can't catch it! [SL]

programme.title: Gwyliau Gartref
programme.desc: I bentre glanmr Llangrannog awn ni'r tro hwn - pwy fydd yn ennill y tro hwn ac ar ba gyllideb? We visit the coastal village of Llangrannog this week - who will win this budget-based show? [SL]

programme.title: Ffasiwn Drefn
programme.desc: Mae'r cyflwynydd, Lara Catrin, a'r trefnydd proffesiynol, Gwenan Rosser, yn rhoi trefn ar gwpwrdd dillad Alys Mererid y tro hwn. This time, we tackle Alys Mererid's wardrobe, in Cardiff. [SL]

programme.title: Ceffylau, Sheikhs a Chowbois
programme.desc: Mae Sue ac Emrys yn teithio i Aachen, Yr Almaen, i werthu ebol mewn arwerthiant fawr. Sue & co travel to Aachen, Germany, to sell a foal at one of the world's largest Arabian horse auctions. [SL]

programme.title: Arfordir Cymru: Sir Benfro
programme.desc: Bedwyr Rees sy'n mynd ar drywydd rhai o'r enwau ar hyd arfordir Sir Benfro gan deithio o Afon Teifi hyd at Drefdraeth. New series exploring the place names along the coast of Pembrokeshire. [SL]

programme.title: Ffermio
programme.desc: Bydd Meinir yn ymweld ffermwyr sydd wedi dioddef o droseddau cefn gwlad ac Alun yng nghanol y gwartheg Salers. Nia discovers the impact of the bluetongue virus on Welsh agricultural shows. [SL]

programme.title: Chris a'r Afal Mawr
programme.desc: Cyfres efo Chris 'Flamebaster' Roberts yn bwyta ac yn coginio ei ffordd o amgylch NYC gan flasu pizzas, byrgyr eiconig a brechdanau pastrami mawr. Chris 'Flamebaster' Roberts hits NYC! [SL]

programme.title: Ysbyty: Babis Bach
programme.desc: Am y tro cyntaf erioed, cawn gipolwg tu l i'r llenni ar Adran Newyddenedigol Ysbyty Glan Clwyd. For the first time: a behind the scenes look at Ysbyty Glan Clwyd's Neonatal Department. [SL]

programme.title: Am Dro!
programme.desc: Heddiw fydd Elliw, Rhys, Dilys a Leo yn mynd a'r criw am dro i Gapel, o gwmpas Penarlag, i Rymni, ac o Aberogwr i Ddwn-rhefn. We explore Capel, Hawarden, Rhymney, & Ogmore to Southerndown. [SL]

programme.title: Iolo: Natur Bregus Cymru
programme.desc: Y tro yma, mae Iolo yn chwilio am rywogaethau prinnaf Cymru - llawer ohonyn nhw o dan fygythiad difrifol. Iolo looks for some of Wales' rarest species. [SL]

programme.title: Garddio a Mwy
programme.desc: Mae Adam yn llawn clod i deulu'r cor-bwmpen, ac yn 'Wythnos Ymwybyddiaeth Compostio', mae Meinir yn compostio yn null 'bokashi' o Japan. Sioned's busy curating the wild garden in Pont y Twr. [SL]

programme.title: Y Ci Perffaith
programme.desc: Dan arweiniad Heledd a Dylan bydd Gwyn a Mary yn cael treulio amser gyda dau gi o dan olwg ein cameru cudd. This time, Gwyn and Mary spend time with two dogs, filmed by our hidden cameras.

programme.title: Fferm Fach

programme.title: Cacamwnci

programme.title: Joni Jet

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Dewch i gwrdd ag anifeiliaid bach! Creaduriaid yr ardd sydd dan y chwyddwydr tro ma: y lindys a'r draenog. It's the garden animals under the spotlight this time - caterpillars & a hedgehog.

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Pan mae Maer Morus yn mynd ar ei wyliau, mae Maer Campus yn bachu ar y cyfle i wneud ei hun yn Ddirprwy Faer Porth yr Haul. People are not happy with the new mayor: hmm, can the pups help?

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Gwaelod Y Garth sy'n ymuno Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Gwaelod Y Garth join Pwdryn and Melys to play candyland themed games.

programme.title: New: Penblwyddi Cyw
programme.desc: Cyfle i edych 'nl dros rai o gyfarchion pen-blwydd yr wythnos. A look back at some of this week's birthday greetings.

programme.title: Y 'Sgubor Flodau
programme.desc: Cyfres newydd efo pobl ledled Cymru'n ymweld 'r 'sgubor i ofyn i'r tm cynllunio creadigol i greu blodau syfrdanol ar gyfer pobol haeddiannol fel syrpreis. New series about expert florists.

programme.title: Y Ci Perffaith
programme.desc: Cyfres wedi'i chyflwyno gan Heledd Cynwal, gyda llu o arbenigwyr wrth gefn. Cawn helpu 4 teulu sy'n ysu am gael gi - pa fath fydd yn eu siwtio? We help 4 families find their perfect dog.

programme.title: Y Ci Perffaith
programme.desc: Dan arweiniad Heledd a Dylan bydd Gwyn a Mary yn cael treulio amser gyda dau gi o dan olwg ein cameru cudd. This time, Gwyn and Mary spend time with two dogs, filmed by our hidden cameras.

programme.title: Taith Bywyd
programme.desc: Owain sy'n mynd a'r cyflwynydd, dylanwadwr ar actifydd, Jess Davies, ar Daith Bywyd. Owain Llyr Williams takes the presenter, influencer and activist, Jess Davies, on her life journey.

programme.title: Y Fets
programme.desc: Mae symptomau dau gi yn peri penbleth i Kate y fet, Scampi'r gath angen triniaeth gymhleth ar ol ffeit a Dolly'r Schnauzer angen tynnu dannedd! It's all about the dogs and a cat today!

programme.title: Y Sn

programme.title: Am Dro

programme.title: Yr Ynys - Ciwba
programme.desc: Heddiw bydd Cerys Matthews yn teithio i Giwba. Cerys Matthews travels to Cuba and meets people living the socialist reality on the world's only communist island.

programme.title: Darn Bach o Hanes
programme.desc: Dewi Prysor sy'n ymweld ag amrywiaeth o'r hen lysoedd Cymreig yng Ngwynedd. Dewi visits the locations of some of the courts of Gwynedd and explains Edward I's policy of wiping them out.

programme.desc: The story of the people who have struggled for the right to roam in England - from the mass trespass on Kinder Scout in 1932 to the great Dartmoor Gathering of 2023.

programme.title: Britain's Beautiful Rivers
programme.desc: Richard explores the wilds of Scotland as he journeys down the River Clyde, in search of clawed alien invertebrates and other elusive species, and learns about the impact the Clyde has had globally.

programme.title: Britain's Beautiful Rivers
programme.desc: Richard discovers the River Derwent's historical importance, as he journeys from the Derbyshire Peaks to Derby, the home of Rolls-Royce. Last in series

programme.title: Futtock's End
programme.desc: Ronnie Barker stars as General Futtock, who has a motley group of guests stay at his country estate - and chaos ensues. Contains 70s social attitudes.

programme.title: The Stick Up
programme.desc: In this period caper, set in 1930s England, romance blooms between two very different people, an American thief and an Irish woman.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven Deadly Sins
programme.desc: Bawdy seventies sketch comedy film starring a bevy of British talent from Bruce Forsyth and Harry Secombe to Joan Simms and June Whitfield. Contains 70s social attitudes.

programme.title: Sex Actually with Alice Levine
programme.desc: Across the country, Alice explores what sex means for modern Brits: pleasure, money, something spiritual? Contains scenes of a sexual nature, nudity and strong language.

programme.title: The Sex Thief
programme.desc: Riotous early 70s comedy in which an audacious cat burglar steals more than his female victims' jewellery. Contains sexual scenes.

programme.title: Doomwatch
programme.desc: Scientists investigate a remote island plagued by mutations caused by toxic waste, uncovering a disturbing government cover-up.
